allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(front-matter\): remove node:process import to fix Vite externalization error

Root cause: The front-matter package imported process from node:process,
causing Vite to externalize the module when bundling for the browser.

Fix: Removed the import since the typeof check already handles the case
where process doesn''t exist, and in Node.js environments process is
available globally without the import.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
